Description:
Detects XSS attempts injected via GET requests in access logs

Author: Saw Win Naung, Nasreddine Bencherchali
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cross Site Scripting Strings
Query: eql select * from _source_ where (cs-method = 'get' and (log like '%=<script>%' or log like '%=%3cscript%3e%' or log like '%=%253cscript%253e%' or log like '%<iframe %' or log like '%%3ciframe %' or log like '%<svg %' or log like '%%3csvg %' or log like '%document.cookie%' or log like '%document.domain%' or log like '% onerror=%' or log like '% onresize=%' or log like '% onload="%' or log like '%onmouseover=%' or log like '%${alert%' or log like '%javascript:alert%' or log like '%javascript%3aalert%') and  not sc-status = '404')
